question: 丹念
sourceMnemonic: If you don't want your <kanji>thought</kanji>s to turn <kanji>rust colored</kanji>, you need to be <vocabulary>diligent</vocabulary> and studying, learning, and experiencing new things. Without diligence your brain and all your thoughts will get old, and stale, turning a rusty, gross color.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
